SEARCH
Package bg.tu_varna.sit.a1.f22621621.interfaces

Interface GrammarCommands

All Known Implementing Classes:
GrammarCommandsImpl
public interface GrammarCommands
The interface Grammar commands. It provides methods for the simpler commands that work on a Grammar - listing all Grammars, printing a Grammar, adding and removing a Rule from a Grammar, saving a Grammar to a new file.
